code: import axios from"axios";var API_URL="http://localhost:3001/api/v1/user/";var AuthService={signup:function signup(credentials){console.log("credentials",credentials);return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"signup"),credentials);},login:function login(credentials){return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"login"),credentials);},logout:function logout(){return localStorage.removeItem("token");},getCurrentUser:function getCurrentUser(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("token"));}};export default AuthService;
